text:
When ever i run my ant(Apache Ant version 1.5 compiled on July 9 2002) to build 
my project on Solaris (SunOS sunone 5.9 Generic_112233-02 sun4u sparc 
SUNW,Ultra-4) It compiles all the files. The way it actually worked earlier was 
it compiled only those files which are changed. As a sample i have attached a 
tar file in which there are below components( i can not figure out where to 
attach files).
1. src - contains a Test java file
2. dest - dir where Test.java is compiled
3. build.xml for ant
4. runant.sh - file to run ant(contains java home and ant home settings). This 
can be avoided.

Thanks in advance
-jai
